short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An elegant way to provide a simple reminders upon visiting websites. Open the extension, type your reminder and forget.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mindful Reminders is a powerful Chrome extension designed to keep you organized and ensure you never miss an important website visit again! With this user-friendly tool, you can effortlessly set reminders for specific websites and receive convenient operating system notifications whenever you navigate to those sites.

Key Features:

Seamless Reminder Integration: Mindful Reminders seamlessly integrates with your Chrome browser, allowing you to set reminders for individual websites with just a few clicks. Whether it's for important deadlines, meetings, sales, or personal tasks, this extension has got you covered.

Unintrusive Notifications: Stay on top of your schedule by receiving simple notifications in the top right of your browser window. Snooze and complete your reminders right from the notification window.

Website-Specific Reminders: Tailor your reminders to suit each website's specific requirements. Never forget to check your favorite blogs, social media updates, or online shopping deals again!

User-Friendly Interface: Mindful Reminders boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface, making it effortless to manage your reminders. Quickly add, complete, or delete reminders with just a few simple clicks. Stay organized and optimize your browsing routine with ease.

Privacy and Security: We understand the importance of your privacy and data security. Rest assured, Mindful Reminders adheres to strict privacy standards, ensuring that your browsing habits and personal information remain confidential.

Upgrade your browsing experience and stay on top of your important website visits with Mindful Reminders. Never miss a deadline, sale, or time-sensitive task again! Download the extension today and take control of your online schedule.
